channel.title: Portals and Language?
channel.description:
Alright... so I'm startng my first server and I need to know how to move portals to new coords..
Also, I need to know how to change what people say.. (e.g "Welcome to Project Czar! Rawr!" ===> "Welcome to G-SCAPE" I use Project Czar as my source if that is any help.

item.title: Portals and Language?
item.dc:creator: @G-Scape.no-ip.org G-Scape.no-ip.org
item.description:
@G-Scape.no-ip.org wrote:

Alright… so I’m startng my first server and I need to know how to move portals to new coords…

Also, I need to know how to change what people say… (e.g “Welcome to Project Czar! Rawr!” ===> “Welcome to G-SCAPE”
I use Project Czar as my source if that is any help.
